Articles.Content:
Hi!! I'm pretty new too mods in ksp.,.,.I installed Kerbal Inventory System for KSP v1.3.1.,.,.,Everything seems to work fine.,.,.,however when I go on EVA with a kerbal, Its inventory is just too small to carry anything

I have no other mods installed. Any Kerbal has Inventory of only 1.00 L

I have also tried the solutions of the previously asked questions but those didn't work for me

Thanks in advance...
